  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bios_es_20070518_3_0030100</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bios_es_20070518_3_0030100</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">La materia viva</string>
            <string language="en">Living matter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lebender Stoff</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Matière vivante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matéria viva</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Materia vivente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα διαβίωσης</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Tema que explica la estructura y la función de los grupos de biomoléculas, empezando por el agua y continuando con las sales minerales, los glúcidos, los lípidos, los prótidos y los ácidos nucleicos.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic explaining the structure and function of the groups of biomolecules, starting with water and moving on to mineral salts, glucides, lipids, protides and nucleic acids.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">materia</string>
            <string language="en">matter</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, welches die Struktur und die Funktion der 
Gruppen der Biomoleküle, beginnend mit Wasser erklärt und an auf 
Mineralsalze, Glukide, Lipide, Protide und Nukleinsäuren bewegt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet expliquant la structure et la fonction des 
groupes de biomolécules, commençant par l'eau et passant aux sels 
minéraux, aux glucides, aux lipides, aux protides et aux acides 
nucléiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que explica a estrutura e a função dos 
grupos dos biomolecules, começando com água e movendo-se sobre para 
sais minerais, glucides, lipids, protides e ácidos nucleic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che spiega la struttura e la funzione dei
gruppi delle biomolecole, cominciando dall'acqua e passante verso i 
sali minerali, i glucidi, i lipidi, i protidi e gli acidi nucleici.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που εξηγεί τη δομή και τη λειτουργία των ομάδων 
βιομορίων, αρχίζοντας από το ύδωρ και κίνηση προς τα ορυκτά 
άλατα, glucides, τα λιπίδια, protides και τα νουκλεϊνικά 
οξέα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stoff</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">matière</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">matéria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">biosfera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">materia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βιόσφαιρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η βιολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θέμα</string>
          </keyword>
